channel.title: String on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in String on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: NeuralClothSim: Neural Deformation Fields Meet the Thin Shell Theory
item.description: NeuralClothSim: A new quasistatic cloth simulator using thin shells represented by neural fields, enabling memory-efficient, resolution-independent, physically-accurate simulations.
